author: Derek Lawrence
title: Netflix announces Uncut Gems to begin streaming in May
description: You can't disagree with our excitement about Adam Sandler's dark indie darling coming to Netflix.
content:
Uncut Gems is coming to Netflix, and I disagree with anyone who isn't excited.
Adam Sandler's dark indie darling is heading to the home of his very different collection of films, with the streamer revealing that Uncut Gems will be available beginning May 25.… [+1013 chars]
